Text.Page:
We're making a push to secure the Blighted Village.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:40#1#berserk scarecrows}, {@LinkCreature:40#5#berserk harvest golems}, {@LinkCreature:40#13#prion eviscerators}, and {@LinkCreature:40#31#mutated tribladers}. We need to check the contamination levels, so collect samples from the fallen.

Find Lashirah at the Quarantine Zone Research Center when you're finished.
There'll be more work for you whenever you want it, <PCNAME>. Our task, I fear, will never be finished.
Did you bring the samples? I can't begin without them.
